snippet: Michael Phelps closed out his medal haul at the Summer Olympics with a final curtain call, swimming two laps of butterfly as a member of the United States’ victorious 4x100-meter medley relay team.
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps closed out his medal haul at the Summer Olympics with a final curtain call, swimming two laps of butterfly as a member of the United States’ victorious 4x100-meter medley relay team.

headline.seo: In Final Race, Phelps Wins Medal 22 and Gold 18 in Relay
headline.main: With Relay Victory in His Final Race, Phelps Claims 18th Gold
